bill.summary: 4/30/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for National Alcohol and Drug Addiction Recovery Month. Recognizes and applauds organizations: (1) raising awareness about the importance of recovery through the Recovery Month Luncheon; and (2) promoting awareness of treatment options. Urges organizations to work collaboratively to implement new programs to treat drug abuse.
